data.message: I'm unable to access my real Facebook page.

replies.message: Hey, Judy. Thanks for bringing this to our attention. This sounds like a feature issue. Please help us track these issues and submit the problem to support through our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2cz3Woo. -Rhea

I wasn't able to resolve my problem through the help center; my internet went down last week then after it came up, after 2 days, I haven't been able to access my true page. I've been attempting to do this for three days.
When this happened last year I started a new Facebook page so I am able to use that one but then I lose all of the memories from friends.
